import save from "../../assets/images/icons/bookmark.svg"; import like from "../../assets/images/icons/like.svg"; import comment from "../../assets/images/icons/comment.svg"; const EventCardSM = ({ item, author, title, views_count, image, setModalActiveHandler, setSingleArticleHandler, }) => { return (
{ setModalActiveHandler(true); //deschide modal setSingleArticleHandler(item); //transmite informatia spre modal }} >
{title.slice(0, 30)}

{author.name}

{views_count}

{views_count}

); }; export default EventCardSM;
